title: Milan hit by rail strike in run-up to opening of Games

title: First months of Maine winter have been colder and snowier than recent years
description: But the temperatures and snowfall aren't breaking short- or long-term records. At least not yet.
content: Maine may be off to a cold, snowy winter, but the long-term trend is clear: the state is warming, its coldest days are losing their bite, and the seasonal temperatures and snowfall havent broken reco… [+4828 chars]
de: Die ersten Wintermonate in Maine waren kälter und schneereicher als in den letzten Jahren. Doch die Temperaturen und der Schneefall brechen weder kurz- noch langfristige Rekorde. Zumindest noch nicht.
en: First months of Maine winter have been colder and snowier than recent years. But the temperatures and snowfall aren't breaking short- or long-term records. At least not yet.
la: Primi menses Cenomannienses hieme frigidiores et nivales annis proximis fuerunt. Sed temperaturae et nix brevis vel diu terminus monumentis non franguntur. In at nulla nisi.

title: A slippery slope: Beware of Winter Olympics scams and other cyberthreats
description: It’s snow joke – sporting events are a big draw for cybercriminals. Make sure you’re not on the losing side by following these best practices.

de: Eine heikle Angelegenheit: Hüten Sie sich vor Betrügereien bei den Olympischen Winterspielen und anderen Cyberbedrohungen. Es ist ein Schneewitz – Sportveranstaltungen sind ein großer Anziehungspunkt für Cyberkriminelle. Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie nicht auf der Verliererseite stehen, indem Sie diese Best Practices befolgen.
en: A slippery slope: Beware of Winter Olympics scams and other cyberthreats. It’s snow joke – sporting events are a big draw for cybercriminals. Make sure you’re not on the losing side by following these best practices.
la: Clivus lubricus: Olympia hiemalia cave scams et cyberthretas alias. Iocus niveus est - res ludicrae magnae trahunt pro cybercriminalibus. Fac in parte amissa non es haec optima exercitia sequendo.

title: Berlin Hospitals Struggle to Treat Hundreds of Falls During Winter Freeze Because Environmental Laws Forbid Use of Salt on Sidewalks
description: Repeated snowfall and freezing rain have coated the open-air insane asylum known as Berlin in a thin sheet of slippery ice since the beginning of January. To spare plants, city environmental laws have long forbidden using salt on pedestrian paths and stairway…
content:
From THE DAILY SCEPTIC
Repeated snowfall and freezing rain have coated the open-air insane asylum known as Berlin in a thin sheet of slippery ice since the beginning of January. To spare plants, cit… [+3251 chars]
de: Berliner Krankenhäuser haben Schwierigkeiten, Hunderte von Stürzen während des Winterfrosts zu behandeln, weil Umweltgesetze die Verwendung von Salz auf Gehwegen verbieten. Wiederholter Schneefall und gefrierender Regen haben die Freiluft-Irrenanstalt Berlin seit Anfang Januar mit einer dünnen Schicht rutschigen Eises überzogen. Um Pflanzen zu schonen, ist die Verwendung von Salz auf Fußgängerwegen und Treppen seit langem in städtischen Umweltgesetzen verboten.
en: Berlin Hospitals Struggle to Treat Hundreds of Falls During Winter Freeze Because Environmental Laws Forbid Use of Salt on Sidewalks. Repeated snowfall and freezing rain have coated the open-air insane asylum known as Berlin in a thin sheet of slippery ice since the beginning of January. title: Nor’easter slams Carolinas, Virginia with snow as blizzard conditions, vicious winds loom as storm intensifies
description: Snow is falling in the Carolinas and Virginia as a major winter storm moves across the Southeast, bringing dangerous cold, blustery winds and even the possibility of blizzard conditions throughout the weekend.

de: Nor’easter überschwemmt Carolinas, Virginia mit Schnee, es herrscht Schneesturm, heftige Winde drohen, während der Sturm stärker wird. In den Carolinas und Virginia fällt Schnee, während ein schwerer Wintersturm über den Südosten zieht und gefährliche Kälte, stürmische Winde und sogar die Möglichkeit eines Schneesturms am Wochenende mit sich bringt.
en: Nor’easter slams Carolinas, Virginia with snow as blizzard conditions, vicious winds loom as storm intensifies. Snow is falling in the Carolinas and Virginia as a major winter storm moves across the Southeast, bringing dangerous cold, blustery winds and even the possibility of blizzard conditions throughout the weekend.
la: Nor'easter slams Carolinas, Virginia cum nivis ut condiciones blizzardas, venti vitiosi sicut tempestas exasperatur. Nix in Carolinas et Virginiam cadit, ut tempestas hiemalis maior trans meridiem movet, periculosos frigora, ventos minasque afferens ac etiam possibilitas blizzariae condiciones per volutpat.

title: DC residents furious with schools still closed, streets a snowy mess: ‘Democrats are worried about the wrong ice’
